name: DOKDO
description:
Game of healing and adventuring the sea!!
Explore islands, across the Pacific Ocean and the Atlantic Ocean.
Go fishing, upgrade boat, and fight sea battles.
Build your ship stronger and stronger!
Also, enter arena and show your power!

Enjoy an exciting journey on the beautiful sea.
Oh , be careful the octopus, It`s very strong

Addictive strategy ocean Game “DOKDO”
